QuestData.Title: In Death We Are Truly Tested
QuestData.Description:
Vyraz is the one who trapped me within the Maw. He has long been in league with the House of Rituals and the House of Constructs.
No doubt he intended to trap you within that hellish place as well.
It is time he be brought to justice for his treason. Stand with me, and we will face him as one.
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront Vyraz about the death of Margrave Krexus.
QuestData.RewardText: We are struggling to hold the line. We need to act fast.
